title: Online Video Tutorial Genre Analysis and Multimodal Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners aim to enhance job-related competencies in science, participating in asynchronous learning using personal devices.

learning_goals: The seven presentation formats of online video tutorials can be analyzed and compared from a multimodal perspective.
A framework can be applied to evaluate educational effectiveness by analyzing the interaction of visual/auditory/textual elements within videos.
Through project-based learning, optimal multimodal strategies can be designed when creating practical calculus tutorial content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
